sentences.en: a meeting of the European allies
He will have no choice but to ally himself with the new movement.
sentences.cn: 他除了与新运动结盟别无选择。

sentences.en: I am sensible of the importance of having an ally of such weight.
sentences.cn: 有这样一位和我志同道合的人,我感到对我很有意义.

sentences.en: In 1997, she landed her big break in " Ally McBeal ".
sentences.cn: 而真正使刘玉玲成名的还要算是1997年的影片《甜心俏佳人 》.

sentences.en: In that war England was not an ally; she was neutral.
sentences.cn: 在那场战争中,英国不同任何一国结盟, 保持中立.

sentences.en: It is possible to communicateseri - ally between distributed MCS —48 and IBM — PC.
sentences.cn: 分散的MCS—48与IBM—PC之间具有串行通信能力.

sentences.en: Now, you have to take Michael and Ally to the doctor right now.
sentences.cn: 现在, 你必须马上带马修和艾丽去看医生.

sentences.en: Results ADHD and CD patients presented irregular CNV wavefrom, especi ally CD patients.
sentences.cn: 结果　ADHD 、 CD波形均有变异,以CD为显著.

sentences.en: Ridley was one of the Queen’s closest allies.
sentences.cn: 里德利是女王最亲密的盟友之一。

sentences.en: Sydney Carton , idlest and most unpromising of men, was Stryver's great ally.
sentences.cn: 西得尼·卡尔登,最懒散和最无望的人, 是史曲勒孚的大盟友.

sentences.en: The closest ally to the Tattaglia Family was Don Emilio Barzini.
sentences.cn: 塔塔格里亚家族最亲密的盟友就是艾密里奥-巴茨尼老头于.

sentences.en: The desertion of an ally, especially from fear of war, saps the spirit of any army.
sentences.cn: 抛弃盟国, 尤其是害怕战争, 就会使任何一支部队的士气被削弱.

sentences.en: The peasants are the chief ally of the proletariat.
sentences.cn: 农民是无产阶级最主要的同盟军.

sentences.en: Two conversations with our longtime ally King Hussein bracketed the meeting with Ismail.
sentences.cn: 我们同长期的盟友侯赛因国王的两次谈话与我们同伊斯梅乐的会晤是同等重要的.

sentences.en: Wait a second. I want to watch Ally McBeal.
sentences.cn: 等等. 我想看俏佳人>.

sentences.en: We only crush our finest natural ally.
sentences.cn: 我们只不过把我们最优秀的天然盟国打跨罢了.

sentences.en: When you play an ally, it enters play ally row.
sentences.cn: 当你出一张军队牌的时候, 这张牌将被放入军队列.

words.tran_cn: 联合的；同盟的；与…同属一系

trans.tran_en: a country that agrees to help or support another country in a war
a country that agrees to help or support another country in a war
to help and support other people or countries, especially in a war or disagreement
